list_definition.definition: a long slender rod eg used as the symbol of magic power by conjurors, fairies etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: In the story, the fairy waved her magic wand and the frog became a prince.

list_ex_of_english: The x position of the wands sends control 10 messages (stereo panning).
The rate of triggering and duration of the notes can be raised and lowered within a certain range by moving up or down the wand while pressing its button.
Wand proved that the partial evaluator is correct, in the sense that if it is given an output from the binding-time analysis, then indeed it produces a specialized program.
Even if it is an imperative, however, there is no magic wand that can deliver good governance.
